chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This document describes the design and architecture for version 2 of the project management tool (PMT2).

chapter.title: Users
chapter.para: The PMT2 separates user authentication into a separate module. This will hopefully allow us to reuse username/password info across multiple projects. It will also potentially allow us to replace our authentication module with a module that interfaces with ACIS' campus-wide kerberos authentication with minimal hassle.
